text: Nurmuhemmet Tohti (also Nurmemet Tohti, Nurmamat Tohti) (December 1949 â€“ 31 May 2019) was a Uyghur writer. He studied in Xinjiang University, from 1973 to 1977. He taught at Khoten Normal College. He died in a Chinese 're-education' camp. == References == Category:1949 births Category:2019 deaths Category:20th-century Chinese writers Category:Uyghur language Category:21st- century Chinese writers
title: Nurmuhammad Tohti
